channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Backup Bolt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Backup Bolt

item.title: CVE-2023-7236|2024-06-04T17:17:28.635Z -- unknown -- backup%20bolt
item.description: The Backup Bolt WordPress plugin through 1.3.0 is vulnerable to Information Exposure via the unprotected access of debug logs. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the debug log which may contain information like system errors which could contain sensitive information.
